content: heart shaped doily table topper included is a chart and a stitch diagram to aid beginners on the filet stitch how to increase/decrease how many treble stitches used to increase as you climb to the top of the chart how to decrease as get to the top and form the shape the user is required to have working knowledge of how to create chain stitches slip stitches double_crochet and treble_crochet stitches materials cotton size 5 hook size 4 1899 yds 35 x 36 inches cotton size 10 hook size 7 1691 yds 29 x 28 inches cotton size 20 hook size 9 1587 yds 28 x 27 inches cotton size 30 hook size 11 1484 yds 27 x 26 inches
